title: GTM Sprint
subtitle: Build your go-to-market strategy from first customer to scale
outcome: A complete go-to-market plan with channels, messaging, pricing, and 90-day execution roadmap

agenda.title: Customer Segmentation & ICP
agenda.details: Define your ideal customer profile and segments

agenda.title: Positioning & Messaging
agenda.details: Craft your value proposition and messaging framework

agenda.title: Pricing & Revenue Model
agenda.details: Develop pricing strategy and revenue model

agenda.title: 90-Day Roadmap
agenda.details: Build your execution plan with milestones and metrics

whoItsFor: Startups ready to acquire customers systematically
Founders with a product but unclear on how to reach customers
whoItsNotFor: Established businesses with mature GTM processes

facilitator.name: Alex Rivera
facilitator.title: Former Head of Growth, scaled 3 startups to $10M+ ARR
